channel.title: Home on Strike WEF
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Strike WEF

item.title: Posters & Flyers
item.description: Here are posters and flyers for your own use Don’t you have a printer? We have pre-printed! Write us an email and we’ll see how you can get a poster :) Poster German - Download English - Download French - Download Flyer German - Download English - Download

item.title: Press
item.description: For media inquiries, contact us under strike.wef@posteo.de

item.title: Route & Times
item.description: Will be updated as soon as we have coordinated the route with the local authorities.

item.title: Why are we hiking against the WEF?
item.description: Read here why we are hiking against the WEF

item.title: Photos
item.description: 2024 Many thanks to Sepp de Vries 2023 2022 2020

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please feel free to send us an email with suggestions or if you are interested in joining in to strike.wef@posteo.de. You can also contact us at this email address for media enquiries.

item.title: Donate
item.description: Our donation account Since the hike unfortunately requires money for food, gym rental, mobilization, etc., we are dependent on donations every year. Donations can be transferred to this account: Verein Die Wandervögel 8003 Zürich CH82 0839 0039 9271 1000 0 We thank you very much!

item.title: Action Consensus
item.description: Click here for the action consensus which applies to everyone during the hike.

item.title: Antirep
item.description: Here you will find all the important legal information that could be relevant during the hike.

item.title: Packing list
item.description: Don’t know what to take with you? Then you’ll find a packing list here!
